amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 1101 of the bill which relates to FERC process coordination.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 2 printed in House report 114-359 to strike section 1101 of the bill which relates to FERC process coordination.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tonko amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 244 (Roll no. 657).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
